name: Large-Cap Daily Candlestick Reversal Strategy
description: Long-only candlestick pattern strategy for S&P-500 constituents on daily bars. Entries require either a Morning Star or Bullish Engulfing candle to form above the 50-day SMA with 10% volume surge. Exits occur on an opposite bearish pattern, 50-day SMA breakdown, 3.5% profit target, or 2% stop. Uses 1.5% equity risk per trade via fixed-fraction sizing.
